name: Dilbur The Dragosaur
description:
Dilbur The Dragosaur

In my take on the Google Dino Game you play as a Dragosaur (half dragon-half dinosaur) named Dilbur.

This is an endless runner high score game where you will be jumping over cactus and pterodactyls.

Dilbur will periodically shoot fireballs that will destroy enemies on contact, they will move towards the mouse.

This game was made for this game jam : https://itch.io/jam/dinojam2

The focus was : Dinosuar

The theme was : Volcano

Controls:

Jump : Space

Fireball : Mouse

It is recommended you play in full screen.

Credits : 

Font : https://www.1001fonts.com/setback-tt-brk-font.html

Everything else : https://jackbeterson.itch.io
